name: Fly Away
description: Fly Away is a fun, addicting physics-based paperflyer taking a different approach from the classic 3D Platformers. In this you game control a small paper plane with the desire to get to the end of each level with numerous obstacles in your way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
